content: Same problem here. Stopped receiving emails on December 12, 2023 and now can't send/receive/delete/move messages. Anyone else having this problem??
creator: captainnice

content:
have you checked the credentials that Thunderbird is using? Like the password. Google require oauth2.0 authentication and that should have been corrected last year when you had issues. But Google wrote to me this week telling me I must use two factor authentication. I am not sure how I am going to dump that requirement. I just might have to move to another mail provider like GMX.

Have you tried to log into your gmail account using a browser recently? Google have a habit of blocking mail if they have something to tell you until you log in using a browser.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: You could click the configure manually button and fix it yourself.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Quando non spedisce, ti viene mostrato qualche messaggio di errore? Puoi trascriverlo? Inoltre, quale versione stai usando esattamente? L'account è di tipo IMAP o POP3?

content: Are you receiving error messages? Such as incorrect password? Please share more details. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content:
Hello there We have read the message. We try to help.


Can you send me a screenshot of the message?

antivirus software can sometimes disrupt the cooperation of both, what then happens is that slowness occurs or problems arise. Shut down monitoring or the security software if that is possible.


https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/compacting-folders-potential-complications

How is the diskspace from the computer

Is there still enough space on the hard drive of your computers?

If you have added a limit on your PC for this, please check this as well.


Greetings Firefox volunteer.
creator: googlethunderbird

content:
Hello there

what I mean is to check your hard drive where you keep your profile folder to see if this hard drive is still okay.

Transfer the profile map to a another place to check if it s still intact.

is your profile folder still okay? Send me a message after that. If possible.


Greetings Firefox volunteer
